channel.title: Help with client.java
channel.description: look for some reason whenever i edit client.java nothing happens i put commands i edited shop i deleted valuable data and still nothing so i did this experiment.... i deleted client..java clicked on compile ran the server and it was the same! so that meant for some reason i had been editing for no reason! :mad:ahhhh!!! but i am able to edit other things so if some1 could explain to me how to edit client.java please tell me also my jre thing is _06 so do i need to update cause i tried to but there was a part where it told me i have to put something in and i didnt know what to put so just sayin.also how do i add objects and will lawscape source ever be out?

item.title: Help with client.java
item.dc:creator: @zezuma zezuma
item.description:
@zezuma wrote:

ok.
change what ever you want in clint.java
compile

if your compilers not working replace it with this
@echo off
title SERVER NAME HERE Compiler
“C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause

you can replace the “09” with your java. then try and see if the updates happen i guess

Read full topic
